title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs runnable via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, and GPU support.

title: llama-cpp-ollama
summary: Example showing how to run GGUF models via llama.cpp inside Ollama’s inference engine.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal chat wrapper with history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and services to inject Ollama models into APIs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization and Q&A on your vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands and per-server model selection.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings and strong typing for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from OpenAPI specs; supports streaming and embeddings.
